name: Jordan Smith
persona: Jordan is a first-year Computer Science student who has struggled to adapt to the demands of university life. With a low CGPA and challenges in self-discipline and motivation, Jordan often finds it difficult to keep up with coursework and deadlines. While test anxiety isn't a major issue, Jordan's low perseverance and academic confidence have impacted their academic progress. Jordan is aware of these challenges and is considering seeking academic support to improve performance.
